title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: Hi. I have problem with macbook air 2015  board 820-00165. I got it from customer who looks like to try fix this laptop himself. There was lots of flux on efi chipset. What ever. I got clean bin file for  a1466 emc 2925 and added serial number from the bottom of macbook. After reprogram chip and solder to main board reset pram and smc laptop is loading to half bar and is stop. I change for another fully working ssd but is still this same problem.  Anybody can help with this?

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: ME region problem!!!, you can't replace EFI chip like that, it is not even the same model!!!..... Why did you replace bios in the first place?? What makes you think bios is the problem??

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: Hi. Thank you for replay. I never wanted to touch efi chipset but i seen efi chip was removed and solder very bad way. When i got this laptop i press power button the fan spin for 3 second then stop. So i reprogram bios and now is powering up but loading bar going to half way and stop. Not moving at all now. Not sure what to do now.

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: Well if you do not have the original backup you are fucked. I have no clean ME for these boards, maybe someone else here? Post a link to your ROM file here too.

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: I dont have original backup because someone b4 me try to fix himself and done to much mess with bios file so i has to clear efi and reprogram it again. my friend send me bios file with clean serial number but is no working.

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: I understand that. Any BIOS that you program must have a clean ME region for it to work. I have no file with a clean ME for these boards at this time. Your problem is the "ME region". Instructions on how to make a clean ME region can be found with Google.

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Did you fix Fsys checksum, after SSN has been changed?

I reorganized my Google Drive, so the above link doesn't work anymore.
Try the file you've got as is, with the SSN comes on it.
Or try this one:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mTP3wgNUbRhxvjZ8Qfo4Mq8Sg4ENmVbw/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
If the machine loads macOS, then need to change SSN and finally fix Fsys checksum.

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message: hi , pls show me the procedure after changing the i/o and bios. What is fsys and changing serial number. ? I have 3 such 820-00165 motherboards. They all have same issue. I want to use them. Pls guide me. Thanks

title: macbook air 2015   board 820-00165  problem with loading osx after efi reprogramed
message:
Medusa programmer can do all the job onboard; clean ME, change serial number, fix Fsys checksum and more.
Good to get it, if you plan to repair Apple stuff.

Or you can use UEFITool NE, to solve the actual problem with Fsys checksum.
Read this thread:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/how-can-i-turn-a-bios-file-into-a-readable-format.60128/#post-66232[/URL]
